This week's second patch brings a few small but handy improvements and bugfixes to the game.
Improvements: - Added four new robe equipment for mages. _(Thanks to Maroš "Verienn" Chovanec)_ - Renamed the Goblin Piker to Goblin Pikeman. _(Thanks to Maroš "Verienn" Chovanec)_ - Added description to the 'Cooking' skill. _(Thanks to Maroš "Verienn" Chovanec)_ - Added mana restore ability for the services in the inn. - Added description for the inn's services. _(Thanks to Maroš "Verienn" Chovanec)_ - Lockpicks no longer break on successful lockpicking attempts.
Bugfixes: - Fixed the price of the 'Bronze bastard sword'. _(Thanks to Maroš "Verienn" Chovanec)_ - Fixed that the item type was still 'Scroll' for some 'Spell tome' items. _(Thanks to Maroš "Verienn" Chovanec)_ - Fixed the name of the 'Leather tunic' recipe. _(Thanks to Maroš "Verienn" Chovanec)_ - Fixed that the 'Robinia staff's recipe was not renamed from 'Robinia stave' in the last update. _(Thanks to Maroš "Verienn" Chovanec)_ - Fixed that the player did not get the bonuses from 'Fistfighting' when fought by hand because he/she ran out of arrows. - Fixed that the player got archery experience when fought by hand because he/she ran out of arrows. - Made the 'Healing potion' usable.
Sincerely, Daggers & Sorcery Team
